Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Jules Kirsch Collection on Art Young
Kirsch, Jules P.
Kirsch, Jules P.
TAM.787
.25 linear feet in 2 folders in shared housing
1976-1977 Jules P. Kirsch is a New York-based attorney. He was a member of the Lawyers' Constitutional Defense Committee in the 1960s, focusing on civil rights efforts. This collection consists of materials created and collected by Kirsch concerning cartoonist Art Young, including correspondence between Kirsch and photographer Berenice Abbot and a photographic print of Young. Materials are in English.
Scope and Contents
This collection consists of materials created and collected by Jules Kirsch concerning cartoonist Art Young, including correspondence between Kirsch and photographer Berenice Abbot and a photographic print of Young.
Biographical Note
Jules P. Kirsch is a New York-based attorney. He was a member of the Lawyers' Constitutional Defense Committee in the 1960s, focusing on civil rights efforts.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
This collection is protected by copyright and/or related rights. You are free to use materials in the collection in any way that is permitted by the copyright and related rights legislation that applies to your use. For other uses you need to obtain permission from the rights-holder(s).
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Jules Kirsch in December 2018; the accession number associated with this gift is 2019.062.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Jules Kirsch Collection on Art Young; TAM 787; box number; folder number or item identifier; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Processing Information
At the time of accessioning materials were rehoused in an archival box and folder, and described on the collection-level.
Arrangement
This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.
Correspondence. Kirsch, Jules P. Young, Art, 1866-1943.
